channel.title: The best demo reel

He sent it to pixar ollool

item.title: The best demo reel
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

DEFET:

does minecraft just have horrible optimization?

I think the correct term to describe the optimisation in minecraft is “it’s not”

the game runs like crap because it’s poorly coded just like wurm online, it has nothing to do with the platform or language

Read full topic

item.title: The best demo reel
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“STH, post:18, topic:437482”][quote author=DEFET link=topic=540190.msg3957598#msg3957598 date=1332911336]
does minecraft just have horrible optimization? it seems all to be processing power even though it isn’t processing too much. it may be over-processing, perhaps it should have an option to post-process/buffer.
makes me believe that any other similar sandbox games with higher than 4-sided polygons would be extremely cpu-fucked for a while. i don’t even think it utilizes the GPU
[/quote]

The amount of polygons on screen at any given time (at ground level) are close to the same as in other games. Don’t think that because they are cubes they are easy. Environments with smaller height densities can be achieved with much less polygons.[/quote]
Its not close at all lol. Average polys per prop in games are usually 3-5k, and characters 13k each, and thats not even counting the environments.

Read full topic

item.title: The best demo reel
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

[quote=“DEFET, post:16, topic:437482”]does minecraft just have horrible optimization? it seems all to be processing power even though it isn’t processing too much. it may be over-processing, perhaps it should have an option to post-process/buffer.
makes me believe that any other similar sandbox games with higher than 4-sided polygons would be extremely cpu-fucked for a while. i don’t even think it utilizes the GPU[/quote]

The amount of polygons on screen at any given time (at ground level) are close to the same as in other games. Don’t think that because they are cubes they are easy. Environments with smaller height densities can be achieved with much less polygons.

Read full topic

item.title: The best demo reel
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

[quote=“DEFET, post:16, topic:437482”]does minecraft just have horrible optimization? it seems all to be processing power even though it isn’t processing too much. it may be over-processing, perhaps it should have an option to post-process/buffer.
makes me believe that any other similar sandbox games with higher than 4-sided polygons would be extremely cpu-fucked for a while. i don’t even think it utilizes the GPU[/quote]

Ah but you are forgetting that the cubes in Minecraft have 42 million faces.

Read full topic
